key_talking_points: Florida's Sam Bennett scored a goal at 2:07 of the first period, assisted by Carter Verhaeghe and Matthew Tkachuk.
The goal puts Florida ahead 1-0 early in the game.
The game has seen a flurry of activity in the opening minutes, including blocked shots and hits.
Blocked Shot by Edmonton's Cody Ceci on Florida's Sam Reinhart at 18:03 remaining in the 1st period.
Blocked Shot by Florida's Gustav Forsling on Edmonton's Leon Draisaitl at 17:58 remaining in the 1st period.
Hit by Edmonton's Vincent Desharnais on Florida's Steven Lorentz in the offensive zone at 17:46 remaining.
Hit by Florida's Steven Lorentz on Edmonton's Warren Foegele in the defensive zone at 17:22 remaining.
Edmonton called for a timeout at 17:12 after giving up a goal and struggling to maintain possession.
for_commentary_agent.context: The game started with a lot of action. A goal was scored early, but since then there have been a lot of blocked shots, hits and missed shots. Time to shift to mixed coverage. Provide the key plays with some filler.

high_intensity_events.summary: Goal by Sam Bennett (FLA), assisted by Carter Verhaeghe and Matthew Tkachuk.

task_details.specific_guidance: Focus on the early goal and the physical play. Note the scoring contributions from key players.
